titleStmt.title: Plays, never before printed written by the ... Princesse the Duchess of Newcastle.
Plays. Selections. 1668
titleStmt.author: Newcastle, Margaret Cavendish, Duchess of, 1624?-1674.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.

The sociable companions, or, The female wits -- The presence : scenes ... design'd to be put into the Presence, but by reason they would make that play too long ... print[ed] by themselves -- The bridals -- The convent of pleasure -- A piece of a play.
